name: Reptiloid Simulator
description:
Behold, hooman! Reptiloid Simulator will reveal the biggest secret of masons and illuminati: space is not infinite. Actually, we’re running out of space. But silly hoomans should never find it out!!

Controls: holding <right mouse button> will hoover space under the cursor; holding <left mouse button> will, instead, spread it. You cannot spread space unless you have some in your hoover. Pressing <esc> will pause the game.
